title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server for running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, available on PyPI as 'langchain-ollama'.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI).

title: open-webui
summary: Successor to ollama-webui; extensible self-hosted WebUI for Ollama and other LLM providers.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion plugin powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to the local Ollama server.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama and Chroma.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama-powered code explanation and generation commands.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama models, available on PyPI as 'ollama-haystack'.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that uses Ollama for local chat completions.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js client for Ollama (npm: ollama-node).

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust client for Ollama, published on crates.io as 'ollama-rs'.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface that talks to Ollama over the REST API.
